## data visualization Exercise
```{r message=FALSE}
library (dplyr)
starwars
```
### Mass Vs Weight
we will study mass vs weight relationship through scatter plot
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(starwars, aes(x=height,y=mass))+ geom_point()+ labs(title="Mass Vs Height of Starwars Characers ",x="Height",y="Mass")
```

### Anscombe's 
```{r}
library(Tmisc)
quartet %>%
  group_by (set)

```

we visualize all four sets
```{r}
ggplot(quartet,aes(x=x,y=y))+geom_point()+facet_wrap(~ set,ncol=4)
```
